Articles.Content: I bought Kerbal Space Program relatively recently and have had some fun with it thus far. I suppose it's my duty to first introduce myself here before anything else. So greetings, everyone. Also minor question, I cannot seem to figure out how to upload an avatar at all for my profile. The only option it gives me in Edit Avatar is a radio button for "Do not use an avatar". Any help you can provide after my greeting would be appreciated ^^

I was allowed an avatar after my fourth posting, thought I read in forum rules it was 5, but after you reply to this answer to your question, you should see "custom avatar" option below the "do not use". Moderators are making sure that no bots are on here and sift through each new users posts. If you haven't noticed, "Capt'n Skunky's reply to all new users is the same for everybody. Betcha skunky is the lucky one who gets to look through all the new user posts.
My game keeps crashing when I launch my 2nd craft
Gotta be more specific, system specs?, are your ships or planes massive with alot of parts?, using any mods with them? etc....
